abstract: Apple reported revenue of more than one-half billion dollars above analyst expectations and predicted continued strong sales in the current quarter.
snippet: Apple reported revenue of more than one-half billion dollars above analyst expectations and predicted continued strong sales in the current quarter.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Apple on Wednesday reported revenue of more than a half billion dollars above analyst expectations and predicted continued strong sales in the current quarter.

abstract: There has been all kinds of speculation about what Apple might do with its pile of cash, especially as it tries to build on the success of its iPhone. There’s plenty of fuel for such speculation: At the end of 2007, the electronics giant had more than $18 billion in cash and short-term securities on its balance sheet.
lead_paragraph: There has been all kinds of speculation about what Apple might do with its pile of cash, especially as it tries to build on the success of its iPhone. There’s plenty of fuel for such speculation: At the end of 2007, the electronics giant had more than $18 billion in cash and short-term securities on its balance sheet.

abstract: IPod sales are stagnating for Apple. But the company has found new products and business lines that will let it continue to thrive even if its sales of MP3 players crash.
snippet: IPod sales are stagnating for Apple. But the company has found new products and business lines that will let it continue to thrive even if its sales of MP3 players crash.
lead_paragraph: Apple has a little iPod problem. And it is doing an amazing job of rising above it.

headline.main: How Apple Is Preparing for an iPod Slump
